بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
تذكرة حساب أبي حسن أعزّه اللّه
أوّل يوم قسط دانق
بنفسج نصف قيراط ونصف دانق
ولحم نصف لوز وغيره درهم زيت
سكّر نصف دانق
ربعرنبق
وشيرج نصــف دانــق لحم ثلث
شعير دانق غير حــبّــة لحم درهم
أصلح بلّان ثلث ونصف دانق
ودرهم لحم وربع سويق وسكّر
فذلك خمسة الدّراهم وثلث

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
taḏkiraẗu ḥisābi ʾabī ḥasan:in ʾaʿazza hu ăl lāhu
ʾawwala yawm:in qisṭu ****** dāniq
banafsaǧ:un niṣfu qīrāṭ:in wa niṣfu dāniq:in
wa laḥm:un niṣf:un lawz:un wa ġayru hu dirham:un zayt:un
sukkar:un niṣfu dāniq:in
rubʿ zanbaq
wa šīraǧ:un niṣfu dāniq:in laḥm:un ṯulṯ:un
šaʿīr:un dāniq:un ġayru ḥabbaẗ:in laḥm:un dirham:un
ʾaṣlaḥu ballān:un ṯulṯ:un wa niṣfu dāniq:in
wa dirhamu laḥm:in wa rubʿu sawīq:in wa sukkar:in
fa ḏālika ḫamsaẗu ăd darāhimi wa ṯulṯ:un

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Memory note concerning the account of Abû Ḥasan - may God exalt him -
on the first day: one xestes [...] one dâniq
violets a half carat and a half dâniq,
and meat a half, almonds etc. one dirham, oil
sugar a half dâniq
a quarter〚***********〛, oil of jasmine
and sesame-oil a [hal]f dâni[q], meat a third,
barley one dâniq less a ḥ[abb]a, meat one dirham.
Aṣlaḥ. bath attendant (?), a third and a half dâniq
and for a dirham meat and a quarter barley-meal and sugar,
That makes five dirhams and a third.
